entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this morning then clearing. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
